Hello,
You have been assigned as an approver for changing the task owner of the {!General_Task__c.RecordType} of NCR record {!General_Task__c.Non_Conformance__c}.
The new owner of the task is {!General_Task__c.ProposedTaskOwnerName__c}.
Please log in to the Qualityze application and complete the approval process.
Please contact {!General_Task__c.NonConformanceName__c} if you have any questions about this assignment and/or non-conformance record.
Thank you.
